name: Noir with Cheese
description:
An interactive story game and comic detective/mystery set-in the modern day Seattle tech world.

After a networking cheese party, software developer Jules Halloran is framed for the murder of his ex-girlfriend, Kolinka. Now he has 24-hours to discover who really killed her and why or be condemned to a life behind bars – where the only formage comes in a spray can.

Help Halloran solve the crime!

Credits:

Writing and programing by Dylan Paschke
Music by Mikey Perkins

Cast(in order of apperance):

Halloran -  Dylan Paschke
Bennie -    John Jankow
Kolinka -   Anne Hartner
Lornic -     Mark Baxter
Donna -    Sal Fulcher
Grant -     Michael O'Neill
Driver -    Brandon Dill
Tom  -      Chadd Stoops
IRMA -     Gus Costa Paschke
Waiter -    Nate Paschke

Note:

With a background in film and theatre as well as a longtime interest in video and board games, I’ve been wanting to create a game of my own for a bit. So, I set upon making a simple story game. I thought it would be easy; it wasn’t!  

It involved getting familiar with a whole different set of development tools (I mostly used Unity) than I was used to working with in film. Nonetheless, I’m happy to say Noir with Cheese is here (though there may be some updates)!
